channel.title: Web Development on
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on

item.title: Issue #2
item.description: Rendering on the web can be hard! 2019-02-12 | Jason Miller, Addy Osmani https://developers.google.com/web/updates/2019/02/rendering-on-the-web Certainly one of the most interesting article I read in a long time. I like the clear discourse and how easy it is to get the essential to improve our web development techniques. It’s perfectly okay to mostly ship HTML with minimal JS to get an experience interactive. Resumable file upload specification https://tus.
